abstract: Los Angeles County Museum of Art hosts table reading of 1985 film The Breakfast Club, featuring performances by several high-profile actors who were not in the original movie.
snippet: Fans of “The Breakfast Club” were in luck on Thursday as the Los Angeles County Museum of Art hosted a high-profile table reading of that quintessential 1985 film.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Los Angeles County Museum of Art

lead_paragraph: Fans of “The Breakfast Club” were in luck on Thursday as the Los Angeles County Museum of Art hosted a high-profile table reading of that quintessential 1985 film.

headline.main: A Fresh Reading of ‘The Breakfast Club’
headline.print_headline: A Fresh Reading Of ‘The Breakfast Club’
